Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 5 wickets with 11 balls remaining
Shadab Khan's maiden T20I fifty (52 from 22 balls) against South Africa was a key performance leading up to this match
Pre-Game Insights: Both Bangladesh and Pakistan were dependent on other results to figure out their future in the tournament
Pakistan had low returns from Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan in the World Cup
Shadab Khan has shown the ability to adapt to different situations
Bangladesh's middle order needs to perform better
Pakistan beat Bangladesh in their recent tri-series encounters in Christchurch
Miscellaneous Highlights: Three out of four matches at the Adelaide Oval have been won by the side defending a total
Mustafizur Rahman needs four wickets to reach 100 T20I wickets
Shadab Khan is five wickets away from reaching 100 T20I wickets
This was Pakistan's first T20I in Adelaide
